value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 25: December 2020 Update
value.excerpt: In this video, Peter Myers (Microsoft Most Valued Professional - Data Platform, and course developer) and Chris Finlan (Principal Program Manager) describe and demonstrate new capabilities and features added to #Microsoft #PowerBI paginated reports since the online course was recorded.    For more information

value.title: All About DAX.do - Milwaukee Power Platform User Group
value.excerpt: The Milwaukee Brew City User group is hosting the monthly Power BI User Group meeting.  Kevin Arnold Director of Architecture from Expert Analytics will be providing us a full demo of the website DAX.do  Visit PowerBI.tips : https://powerbi.tips  Visit Chicago User Group:  https://community.powerbi.com/t5/Chicago-Power-BI-User-Group/gh-p/pbi_chicago_usergroup

value.title: Austin Power BI User Group - Charticulator 101
value.excerpt: This Austin User Group presentation is all about the Basics of Charticulator. We also go through three demos of visual creations. 1. Build a fancy Bar chart mirroring what is done in desktop 2. Cool chart with stacked bars and scatter plot 3. Box and Whisker chart  Follow Mike on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelcarlo/

value.title: Create Slope Chart (KPI) using Charticulator and using in Power BI
value.excerpt: This another my investigation on creating a custom visual using Charticulator. I created a Slope Chart that can be used as a KPI visual to measure the trend of a specific group in two different scales. IN this example, I have a simple data set with student Name, their score in 2015 and 2014 and another

value.title: How to build custom visuals without code with Power BI | Community Webinar
value.excerpt: In this webinar, learn how to create custom visuals without writing code using a project that originated from Microsoft's own Charticulator. Go through multiple examples of building custom visuals to understand how this tool can fill specific reporting needs.   Learn more: https://community.powerbi.com

value.title: PowerBI Tips Introducing Custom Visuals Gallery
value.excerpt: It's 2019 and a good time for another great tool for Power BI.  I'm proud to announce the release of the Custom Visuals Gallery and Charts Building tool.    Gallery (Download Free Visualization Files) http://gallery.powerbi.tips  Charts (Free no code solution to building visualizations) http://charts.powerbi.tips

This is an amazing external tool to help you as a developer work with Model and Report files. value.title: PowerBI.tips - PUG - External Tools & Business Ops

Additionally, we are introduced to the Amazing Business Ops tool which helps users add External tools into Power BI desktop.   Download Business Ops: https://powerbi.tips/product/business-ops-beta/

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor.  In this video Daniel teaches us how to use the Best Practice Analyzer.    The Best Practice Analyzer can review your model for code errors, or common

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Building Custom Visuals - A Basic Bar Chart
value.excerpt: This video walks through building a custom visual by using http://charts.powerbi.tips  An overview of the application starts off the training session and ends with a completed bar chart for use in Power BI Desktop.  To create your own custom visuals visit: http://charts.powerbi.tips   Down community

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Full Features Review - By Darren Gosbell
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Darren Gosbell the creator of DAX Studio will be giving a live demo of his tool.    In this live webinar Darren will be giving a full overview of all the features of DAX Studio.  - https://daxstudio.org/documentation/features/  Watch the Full Tutorial Series:

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Query Performance Tuning - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Query Performance Tuning.  You will not want to miss this event as Marco is a wealth of knowledge for all things Data Modeling!  Watch the Full Tutorial

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Release 2.11.1
value.excerpt: DAX Studio has just released it's latest version 2.11.1.  With this release comes a number of great improvements.  Come listen to the Creator Darren Gosbell review the latest features of DAX Studio.  New features include:  - Query Builder  - Query Benchmark  - More Quick access buttons  - Exporting button

value.title: PowerBI.tips - Tutorial - Monkey Tool Introduction - Part 1

Come join us to learn about how this tool can help you in your daily work flow.  Follow Ken  Blog: https://xlguru.ca/blog

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals
value.excerpt: This week we look at building a stacked bar chart on https://Charts.PowerBI.Tips  There is a little trick that you need to know no how to add a Y-Axis to the chart.  Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/
